snippet: Xavier University, a Jesuit university in Cincinnati, said this week it would end birth-control coverage for its employees in July, a move that has divided faculty members and students.
abstract: Xavier University, a Jesuit university in Cincinnati, says it will end birth-control coverage for its employees in July, a move that has divided faculty members and students.
lead_paragraph: Xavier University, a Jesuit university in Cincinnati, said this week it would end birth-control coverage for its employees in July, a move that has divided faculty members and students.

headline.seo: Xavier University to Drop Coverage for Birth Control for Workers
headline.main: Ohio: Xavier to Drop Coverage for Birth Control for Employees
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Xavier To Drop Coverage For Birth Control For Employees
